channel.title: Network on 微醉
channel.description: Recent content in Network on 微醉

item.title: Http Header Field
item.description: Request 参数名 说明 示例 Accept 接收的内容类型 Accept: text/plain Accept-Charset 接收的字符编码 Accept-Charset: utf-8 Accept-Datetime 接受的版本时间 Accept-Datetime: Thu, 31 May 2007 20:35:00 GMT Accept-Encoding 接受的编码格式 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate Accept-Language 接受的语言 Accept-Language: zh-CN Authorization HTTP 身份验证的凭证 Authorization: Basic QWxhZGRpbjpvcGVuIHNlc2FtZQ== Access-Control-Request-Method Access-Control-Request-Method: GET Access-Control-Request-Headers Access-Control-Request-Method: GET
